Value: Minerals 260 Limited operates as a mineral exploration company in Australia. The company intends to hold a 100% interest in the Moora gold-nickel-copper-PGE project; an option to earn a 51% interest in the Koojan gold-nickel-copper-PGE project; and interest in the Dingo Rocks project and tenement applications at Yalwest. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in West Perth, Australia. Minerals 260 Limited (ASX:MI6) operates independently of Liontown Resources Limited as of October 5, 2021.
